title: Campus Green Roof Initiative Moves Forward
summary: Facilities announces the first phase of a multi-year sustainability upgrade across campus rooftops.
details: The pilot will retrofit five academic buildings with green roofs designed to cut heat retention by 20 %. Construction begins January 2026 with funding from state climate grants.

title: Library Introduces 24-Hour Study Pods
summary: Students will have round-the-clock access to sound-isolated pods in the main library.
details: The pilot program opens November 10. Each pod includes adjustable lighting, acoustic insulation, and air-circulation sensors to improve comfort during finals week.
